Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-40725 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.62-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-40725 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.62-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package httpd is earlier than 2.4.62-1, affected by CVE-2024-40725
